casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Grady Lee NICHOLSON. No. 238P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Grady Lee Nicholson, Salisbury, for Nicholson, Grady Lee. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. *565James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of July 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
